item.title: What Kind of Sun are You?
item.description: I love astronomy and the universe. I also love analogies between distant topics. For this analogy I have to tell you one thing about stars which are just suns. They differ by size/mass and it determines most properties of a sun. In particular: the larger the size/mass, the brighter the sun shines, the hotter it is, and the shorter it lives! Often, I observe the same with motivation and people. The hotter they burn for something, the stronger their motivation.
